fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
Droptop Four is a popular dropdown app launcher for Windows & Rainmeter.
It is available in two version, a `Basic` one, free, and a `Supporter` one, with a \'pay what you want\' donation.
Both versions have 14 system tray apps, the Always Show option to make it accessible everywhere on top of your desktop and a lot more.

fields.name: Basic Version
fields.content:
The `Basic` version has:
 - 7 home bottons icons
 - 6 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 4 themes to choose from

fields.name: Supporter Version
fields.content:
The `Supporter` version has:
 - 300 home buttons icons
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content: This is the Basic and free version of droptop.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Basic` version has:
 - 7 home bottons icons
 - 6 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 4 themes to choose from

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to download it on the DeviantArt page of Droptop Four:
https://www.deviantart.com/cariboudjan/art/droptop-four-762812007
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Base`

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
This is the Supporter version of droptop.
To download it you can pay what you want through Gumroad.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Supporter` version has:
 - 300 home buttons icons
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to:
1) download the Basic version on the [DeviantArt page of Droptop Four](https://www.deviantart.com/cariboudjan/art/droptop-four-762812007)
2) download the Supporter update through [Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/l/droptop) choosing how much you want to pay for it (from 0$).
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Supporter`

fields.name: Base version
fields.content: The Droptop **Base** version can be downloaded on [GitHub](https://github.com/Droptop-Four/Basic-Version/releases/). To see further informations about the Base version type `/info Base`.

fields.name: Supporter version
fields.content: The Droptop **Supporter** version can be downloaded after paying what you want on [Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/l/droptop). To see further informations about the Supporter version type `/info Supporter`.

fields.name: Base version
fields.content: The Droptop **Base** version can be downloaded on [GitHub](https://github.com/Droptop-Four/Basic-Version/releases/). To see further informations about the Base version type `/info Base`.

fields.name: Supporter version
fields.content: The Droptop **Supporter** version can be downloaded after paying what you want on [Gumroad](https://gumroad.com/l/droptop). To see further informations about the Supporter version type `/info Supporter`.

fields.name: Where to update?
fields.content: Droptop should automatically detect new updates in the last row of the Droptop home menu. You can also find the Update for Droptop on [Github](https://github.com/Droptop-Four/Update/releases/latest).
